recipesJson.name: Peanut Butter Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: MrColdOne
recipesJson.description: A fresh churned peanut butter ice cream. I've been hooked on peanut butter recipes lately and this is one I've been working on for a while. Finally feel it's where it needs to be. Shake and vape certified! I like best after 3 days.

reviews.text: This is so good! Thick ice cream and creamy peanut butter. Tried this per Chef John's recommendation, and I'm so glad I did. This is the perfect peanut butter recipe. Great job!

I let this steep for over a month and it is probably the most balanced peanut butter recipes I have tried. Great blend of sweetness and creaminess, it is not dry at all, peanut butter has been the bane of my existence in this sense. Thanks for the recipe!
Dude this is an amazing peanut butter vape.  I blew threw 60mls. Perfect combo of peanut butters. Awesome job
Very tasty as a shake and vape . Best PB vape I've had to date. Great job
